short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: customizing aws console header color by account name and region

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Colorize GCP console header with your favorite color based on account's name and region.
Using this extension, you can differentiate each AWS project visually.
e.x. setting header color to red for a production project.
